mapper.update:
update PRM_TASK
TASK_NO = #{task_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTID = #{postid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTID_NAME = #{postid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLANID = #{planid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLANID_NAME = #{planid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEAM = #{team,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEAM_NAME = #{team_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIFT = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIFT_NAME = #{shift_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERID_NAME = #{userid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILLSTATUS = #{billstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENANTID = #{tenantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSID = #{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGID_NAME = #{orgid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TS = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DR = #{dr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATIONTIME = #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIEDTIME = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_NAME = #{creator_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSIGN_TIME = #{assign_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEPTID = #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPTID_NAME = #{deptid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID = #{id}

update PRM_TASK set TASK_NO = #{task_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTID = #{postid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTID_NAME = #{postid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLANID = #{planid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLANID_NAME = #{planid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEAM = #{team,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEAM_NAME = #{team_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIFT = #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIFT_NAME = #{shift_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERID_NAME = #{userid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILLSTATUS = #{billstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TENANTID = #{tenantid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSID = #{sysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID = #{orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGID_NAME = #{orgid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TS = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DR = #{dr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATIONTIME = #{creationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIEDTIME = #{modifiedtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_NAME = #{creator_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_NAME = #{modifier_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSIGN_TIME = #{assign_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DEPTID = #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPTID_NAME = #{deptid_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
from PRM_TASK where DR=0
and orgid_name like '%'||#{search.searchMap.orgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and task_no like '%'||#{search.searchMap.task_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and postid like '%'||#{search.searchMap.postid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and planid like '%'||#{search.searchMap.planid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and BILLSTATUS in
${item}
and to_char(ASSIGN_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD')>= '${search.searchMap.starttime}'
and '${search.searchMap.endtime}'>=to_char(ASSIGN_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD')
and postid_name like '%'||#{search.searchMap.team,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
and postid_name like '%'||#{search.searchMap.shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
order by ASSIGN_TIME desc

select
from PRM_TASK where DR=0 and ID in
#{item}
order by assign_time desc

select h.id id, h.task_no task_no, h.postid postid, h.postid_name postid_name, h.planid planid, h.planid_name planid_name, h.assign_time assign_time, h.billstatus billstatus, h.tenantid tenantid, h.sysid sysid, h.orgid orgid, h.orgid_name orgid_name, h.dr dr, h.ts ts,
p.pk_region creator, p.pk_region_name creator_name,
h.creationtime creationtime,
p.vnote modifier,
h.modifier_name modifier_name, h.modifiedtime modifiedtime
p.pk_region_name pk_region_name, p.routeflag routeflag
from prm_task h left join prm_plan p on h.planid = p.id where h.dr=0 and (billstatus = 1 or billstatus = 2) and h.postid = #{postid}

select
deptid_name,
team_name,
shift_name,
postid_name,
sum(case when billstatus = '1' then 1 else 1 end) as "PLANCOUNT", sum(case when billstatus = '4' then 1 else 0 end) as "UNFINISHCOUNT" from prm_task where dr = 0 and creationtime between to_date('${search.searchMap.starttime}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${search.searchMap.finishtime}','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and deptid_name like '%${search.searchMap.deptid_name}%'
and team_name like '%${search.searchMap.team_name}%'
and shift_name like '%${search.searchMap.shift_name}%'
and postid_name like '%${search.searchMap.postid_name}%'
${search.searchMap.groupstr}
